thread.title: PSR confirms payments strategy forum members
thread.title_full: PSR confirms payments strategy forum members

author: Dentons
title: PSR confirms payments strategy forum members
text:
PSR confirms payments strategy forum members more+ C <iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=c395cb00-7841-4f25-9a99-ee8c1a9fe729" width="100%" height="620" frameborder="1" style="border: 2px solid #ccc; overflow-x:hidden !important; overflow:hidden;" scrolling="auto"> 
PSR has confirmed the members of the payment strategy forum. It includes advocates for consumers, retailers, businesses, government and representatives of payment services firms, credit unions, e-money firms and high street banks, all appointed for an initial two-year term. The goal of the forum is to set the strategy for innovation in payment systems where the industry needs to work together. (Source: PSR Confirms Payments Strategy Forum Members
